price: Hujui kwamba Mwenyezi Mungu ana ufalme wa Mbingu na Ardhi? Nanyi hamna mlinzi wala msaidizi isipo kuwa Mwenyezi Mungu.
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٍ
footnotes: Na Yeye, Mwenyezi Mungu, ndiye mwenye ufalme wa Mbingu na Ardhi katika mikono yake. Na nyinyi watu hamna mlinzi wa kukusaidieni, wala tegemeo la kukunusuruni isipokuwa Yeye.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alam taʿlam anna al-laha lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā lakum min dūni al-lahi min waliyyin walā naṣīrin
